UserStory.Name: Search functionality with valid keyword
UserStory.Description:
As a user,
I want to search using a valid keyword,
So that I can view relevant results quickly and easily.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. The search bar is visible and functional.
2. The user enters a valid keyword.
3. Search executes without errors.
4. Results relevant to the keyword are displayed with title, description, and link/image.
5. Results remain until a new search is performed.
6. User can interact with results (click/view details).
7. Keyword may be stored in recent searches (if supported).
UserStory.Notes:
Search index is up to date and populated with relevant data.
The system is not experiencing latency or backend issues.
Internet connection is active.
Search bar is visible and not disabled.
